ygData.subject: Re: BlackFortress
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson was good at blocking out negative comments.  As Rodimus taunts him, he simply ignores him, not uttering one word about it for a moment or so, and he

Tucson was good at blocking out negative comments.  As Rodimus taunts him, =
he simply ignores him, not uttering one word about it for a moment or so, a=
nd he also had Hydras breathing down his neck configuratively.  Still he ke=
eps calm throughout, and first directs his attention to Rodimus.

"Failure?=
  Hmm, Rodimus I don't know.  To you it may seem like failure, to me, yes, =
it was a mistake but also a learning experience. Learn not to go too fast, =
yet make decisions carefully.  So, yes, I configuratively got a flat tire a=
long the way.  But tires can be changed and after that, it's back on the ro=
ad like nothing happened.  Of course to you, it's like a perpetual road blo=
ck.  There, you have my answer.  Nothing more."

He quietly follows orders =
by discarding his weaponry.  Having left his cross bow behind, he merely gi=
ves up an old sword and spear, as his weapons. He somehow felt that if he c=
ame with the bare minimal he wouldn't lose much.

Night Shift also discards=
 his riffle without revolt. Yet he looks at Scorponok after hearing what Tu=
cson Prime said and how he was viewing the situation.

" Okay, yeah, things=
 went South.  Big deal, happens all the time."

Tucson then looks to Cyclon=
us, yes, he had looked as he had before he had lost his sight.  It didn't s=
urprise him though.  He had see and been through worse.

" I'm sorry Cyclon=
us, there are no secrets to share with you.  I have not the answers for the=
 power that has been given to me, because I myself don't know them."

He la=
stly turns to Hydras.  

" Rat Trap and Quickstride pose no threat to you H=
ydras.  They have not entered your base, and done nothing to get you angry.=
  So to that question, I have to say... LEAVE THEM OUT OF THIS.  I am the o=
ne who made the mistake, and it's me you want, not them.  So, I'm here aren=
't I?  You have me and now you have nothing to fear from the outside world,=
 because your main threat is now in your possession.  Think about it, what =
can they do?  They're no threat to you at all."

Night Shift nodds in agree=
ment to his commander's statement. Tucson looks to all his comrades before =
having to be separated from them.

"Kup, I did not intend to put your spark=
 in danger, and for that I am deeply sorry.  Stay strong my friend, this is=
n't forever.  And whatever happens, happens.  My heart goes out to Elita an=
d one day, hopefully, she will never have to worry about anything ever agai=
n."

He puts a hand on Night Shift's shoulder.

" Night Shift, we're going =
to be separated from each other.  Again, this wouldn't be happening if I ha=
dn't ran that red light.  I promise you I will make it up to you but not su=
re as of how I will do it just yet."

Night Shift nodds.

"Heey, it's cool,=
 it's cool, we all mess up sometimes, like ya said. No worries boss bot, we=
'll get through this, like we always do. I'll be okay, I promise."  

They =
shake hands as they wait to be separated from each other.

Outside the fort=
ress, Rat Trap senses something is a miss when it takes far too long for an=
yone to come out.  Quickstride looks down to him.

" Quickstride, it's been=
 a really long time and no word from Wheels or the others.  Somethn's wrong=
."

Quickstride nodds.

"Yeah, something really stinks around here doesn't =
it, and it's not me this time, because I haven't had any bean pods lately."=


Rat Trap swallows hard.

" He told us ta wait out here.   But he also tol=
d us that if he didn't come out right away, ta call for backup.   Lord Elde=
r, it's me, Rat Trap.  Wheels hasn't come out with the other guys yet, and =
it's been a very long time.  Something's wrong.  I think we need backup sir=
."

His voice falters a bit, as he wipes off a tear with his rodent paw.

"=
Aww Wheels, why'dya have ta go'n do that for?  You're the only real friend =
I'll ever have."

Quickstride could see what was happening. He puts his nos=
e down to his rodent comrade.

" Hey, he'll be okay, he probably ran inta a=
 snag.  He'll be fine, he's pretty buff now Rat Trap.  Don't worry, I bet h=
e's got somethn' up his manifold.  It's just gonna take a while, that's all=
."

Rat Trap composes himself and scrambles up onto Quickstride's back.

"W=
e better find someplace ta hide."

Quickstride looks around and finds a bit=
 of thick greenery near the black fortress.  He trots toward it, vanishing =
into the vegitation.

"This should be okay for now.  Well, until Hydras sen=
ds his goons out ta find us which is probably what'll happen.... Ooohh, bea=
n pods..."

Again he thinks of nothing but food and begins to munch on the =
bean pods.  Rat Trap looks onto the fortress hoping that Tucson Prime had a=
 plan in place to get everyone out of there in one piece.
